name: Kaif Khan
testimony: Khelo Mewat organized one of the best tournaments I’ve ever participated in! The matches were well-managed, and everything was fair. Looking forward to playing again next year.

name: Shahbaz Ahamad
testimony: The energy and excitement at Khelo Mewat tournaments are unmatched! From smooth registrations to well-maintained grounds, it was a fantastic experience.

name: Parvez khan
testimony: Khelo Mewat brings the true spirit of sportsmanship! The level of competition was high, and everything was conducted professionally. Hats off to the organizers!

name: Sifran Malik
testimony: As a female athlete, I was thrilled to see such great arrangements for women’s matches too. The crowd support and enthusiasm were incredible!

name: Mohammad Ayaan
testimony: From scheduling to fair umpiring, Khelo Mewat tournaments are truly world-class. It’s great to see such professional events happening in Mewat.

name: Nasir pahalwan
testimony: The tournament was well-organized with clear rules and fair judgment. It was amazing to play against strong teams and showcase our talent.

name: Sajid Malik
testimony: The atmosphere at Khelo Mewat was electrifying! Everything from the matches to the closing ceremony was superbly handled.

name: Aqib Meo
testimony: Participating in Khelo Mewat was a dream come true! The competition was tough, but the experience was unforgettable. Can’t wait for the next edition!
